blocks.orig_text:

blocks.orig_text: 陥雀

blocks.orig_text:

blocks.translated_text:

blocks.translated_text_zh:

blocks.orig_text:

blocks.translated_text_zh:

blocks.orig_text:
ええ・・・

ど、俺もここの一員に

blocks.translated_text_zh:

blocks.orig_text:
何かの役に立たないと

blocks.translated_text:

blocks.translated_text_zh:

blocks.orig_text: どうしたもんかねぇ
